TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StateFlagsChangedHandler(object o, StateFlagsChangedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed StateFlagsChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the StateFlagsChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the StateFlagsChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the StateFlagsChangedHandler is removed from the event.
